overview_of_class:
Quantum mechanics, electronic structure, periodic properties of the elements, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, gas laws, intermolecular forces, properties of solids and liquids, special topics in modern chemistry. Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 161-0 laboratory course.

Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.
name: Accelerated General Chemistry 1
title: WCAS CHEM 151-0-01 Accelerated General Chemistry 1
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students registering for Chem 151-0 01 at 10AM must also register for Chemistry 161-0 01 at 10AM.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

Eligibility to enroll in this course is determined by the Initial Chemistry Assessment. View your placement on the Canvas Initial Chemistry Assessment Site under Grades. If you do not see a course placement, please contact chemhelp@northwestern.edu.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Quantum mechanics, electronic structure, periodic properties of the elements, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, gas laws, intermolecular forces, properties of solids and liquids, special topics in modern chemistry. Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 161-0 laboratory course.

Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.

Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 161-0 laboratory course.
Enrollment in 10AM Chem 151-0 requires enrollment in 10AM Chem 161-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. General Chemistry: Principles and Modern Applications by Petrucci et al., 11th Edition, Pearson, ISBN 9780134097329 ($339.65 new; $254.75 used)*

2. Access to Sapling Learning Course Site (Details to be provided on first day of class) ($27)

3. Model QT2, QT, or NXT Turning Technologies "Clicker" and associated license ($65.70 new; $49.30 used)*

4. Scientific Calculator, any model (Starting at $10)

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 7/12/17. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.
